ApplyCertificate.document: This example shows you how to apply for a free certificate.
ApplyCertificate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyCertificate
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DvAuthMethod": "DNS_AUTO",
    "DomainName": "wgc.red"
}
ApplyCertificate.title: Applying for a free certificate

}

DescribeCertificateOperateLogs.title: Getting the latest five certificate operation logs of users in the last 15 days

DescribeCertificates.document: This example shows you how to get the certificate list.
DescribeCertificates.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeCertificates
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Limit": "1"
}

SubmitCertificateInformation.title: Submitting certificate information

UploadCertificate.document: This example shows you how to upload a certificate.
UploadCertificate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UploadCertificate
<Common request parameters>

{
    "CertificatePublicKey": "CertificateContent"
}
UploadCertificate.title: Uploading a certificate

UploadConfirmLetter.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UploadConfirmLetter
<Common request parameters>

{
    "CertificateId": "flSFd6Fh",
    "ConfirmLetter": "UEsDBBQABgAIAAAAIQCM19MmCg......"
}
UploadConfirmLetter.title: Uploading the confirmation letter for a certificate
